availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, merchant. Son of Felix G. Matheny and [unknown] McCowan. Merchant in Mercer County, Kentucky in 1860. Soldier in Union Army in August 1863.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer, Salvisa, p. 123. Find A Grave, “James H. Matheny (May 18, 1831-November 21, 1913),” Memorial #131383718, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=131383718 (accessed June 4, 2017). Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records - Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994038, Mercer County, p. 1. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Mercer County, KY, August 1863, p. 78, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
